# Eldora UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [animated-badge](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/animated-badge): An animated badge component.
- [animated-frameworks](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/animated-frameworks): An animated frameworks component.
- [animated-grid-pattern](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/animated-grid-pattern): An animated grid pattern component.
- [animated-list](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/animated-list): An animated list component.
- [animated-shiny-button](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/animated-shiny-button): An animated shiny button component.
- [blur-in-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/blur-in-text): A blur in text component.
- [browser](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/browser): A browser SVG component.
- [card-flip-hover](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/card-flip-hover): A card flip hover component.
- [clerk-otp](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/clerk-otp): A clerk OTP component.
- [cobe-globe](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/cobe-globe): A cobe globe component.
- [dock-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/dock-text): A dock text component with interactive hover effects.
- [fade-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/fade-text): A combined fade text component with support for in, up, and down directions.
- [font-weight-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/font-weight-text): A font weight text component.
- [github-inline-comments](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/github-inline-comments): A github inline comments component.
- [gradual-spacing-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/gradual-spacing-text): A gradual spacing text component.
- [grid](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/grid): A grid component.
- [hacker-background](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/hacker-background): A hacker background component.
- [holographic-card](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/holographic-card): An interactive card with a holographic gradient and mouseâ€‘reactive tilt effect.
- [integrations](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/integrations): An integrations component.
- [ipad](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/ipad): An iPad SVG component.
- [iphone-17-pro](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/iphone-17-pro): An iPhone 17 Pro SVG component.
- [letter-pull-up-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/letter-pull-up-text): A letter pull up text component.
- [live-button](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/live-button): A live button component.
- [logo-timeline](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/logo-timeline): An animated logo timeline component with horizontal scrolling logos.
- [macbook-pro](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/macbook-pro): A MacBook Pro SVG component.
- [map](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/map): An animated map component with location markers.
- [marquee](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/marquee): A performant, customizable marquee (scrolling text/content) component.
- [multi-direction-slide-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/multi-direction-slide-text): A multi direction slide text component.
- [novatrix-background](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/novatrix-background): A novatrix background component.
- [orbit-rotation](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/orbit-rotation): An orbit rotation component with customizable icons.
- [photon-beam](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/photon-beam): A photon beam background component with animated light trails.
- [safari-browser](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/safari-browser): A safari browser component.
- [scale-letter-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/scale-letter-text): A scale letter text component.
- [seperate-away-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/seperate-away-text): A seperate away text component.
- [svg-ripple-effect](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/svg-ripple-effect): An SVG ripple effect component.
- [terminal](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/terminal): A terminal component.
- [testimonal-slider](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/testimonal-slider): A testimonial slider component.
- [wavy-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/wavy-text): A wavy text component.
- [word-pull-up-text](https://eldoraui.site/docs/components/word-pull-up-text): A word pull up text component.

## Examples

- [safari-browser-demo](https://github.com/karthikmudunuri/eldoraui/blob/main/example/safari-browser-demo.tsx): Example usage

- [Repository](https://github.com/karthikmudunuri/eldoraui): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://eldoraui.site/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
